thread.title: Shaquille ‘Shaq’ O’Neal’s Mega Florida Estate Asks $28 Million

author: Candace Taylor
title: Shaquille ‘Shaq’ O’Neal’s Mega Florida Estate Asks $28 Million
text:
The enormous, highly elaborate and highly customized Florida estate of former NBA superstar Shaquille “Shaq” O’Neal—which includes the “Shaq Center” fitness facility and the “Shaq-apulco” outdoor swimming complex—is going on the market for $28 million.
Located on about 3 acres in the Orlando suburb of Windermere, the sprawling home with a blue barrel-tile roof measures about 31,000 square feet and has 12 bedrooms, according to listing agent Danial Natoli of Premier Sotheby’s International Realty.
